Frida Blumenberg (ụbọchị irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa May, n'afọ 1935) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ na neon, acrylic, na ọla nchara.

A mụrụ ya na Durban, South Africa na nne na nna Sweden, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ese ihe, na onye na-akpụ ọla edo na London, ebe o nwere ụfọdụ ihe ngosi naanị ya na Institute of Contemporary Art
N'afọ 1960 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise, ọ rụchara ihe osise maka ihe banyere Durban Maritime Terminal nke, n'oge ahụ, bụ ihe osise mosaic kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara ndịda ụwa
N'afọ 1965, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe isii na-anọchite anya Great Britain na Bavarian Government Special Show na Munich, Germany na ihe ngosi akpọrọ "Jewelry as Sculpture"

E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ụlọ ngosi ihe ógè ochie na ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi na England, Canada, Ireland, Germany, Netherlands, South Africa, na America na Institute of Contemporary Art (Boston), National Museum of Women in the Arts (Washington, DC), Denver Art Museum, Dallas Museum of Art, na Houston Museum of Art, tinyere ndị ọzọ
N'ihe ngosi otu, ya na Picasso, Alexander Calder, na Louise Nevelson gosipụtara
A na-egosipụtakwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ụlọ ọrụ gụnyekwara nke Shell, Alcon / Nestlé, Canadian Pacific Railways, na Texas American Banks

A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na mba ụwa na neon na acrylic, ọ jikọtara mmetụta nke oge a maka ihe banyere ndị dị na nka ụlọ ọrụ, dị ka neon, na echiche zuru oke nke imewe na nka.
